ifillArray.Description: This function adds the callerâ€™s address multiple times to the array until it reaches a specified length. When the length exceeds a threshold, the array is cleared.

DecisionPoints: if(listAddresses.length<1500) - Determines whether to fill the array or reset it.
StateTransitionPoints: Updates to listAddresses array - Appends addresses to the list when filling.
Resetting listAddresses array - Clears the list when the length threshold is reached.
